content: this beginner friendly tutorial will walk you through making a rustic tree ornament right hand crochet along video https //youtu be/ttudfp0qpqs left hand crochet along video https //youtu be/2xmb7xuf4aw beginners to advanced crocheters can create this pattern with the following techniques -magic_ring -single_crochet -slip_stitch -increasing 2 single crochets into one stitch -fasten_off the pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions and pictures to help you along the way rustic tree ornament is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round rustic tree ornament is crocheted in worsted weight yarn is approximately 2 5 inches tall be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun supplies needed to make rustic christmas tree ornament worsted-weight yarn e/4 3 50mm crochet hook yarn/darning needle scissors twine fabric glue locking stitch markers optional pictured yarn knit picks shine worsted in serrano red knit picks shine worsted in macaw green knit picks wool of the andes tweed in down heather beige tweed knit picks wool of the andes tweed in farmhouse heather grey tweed knit picks wool of the andes tweed in reindeer heather brown tweed
